src_original: stotā sugataviśiṣṭaguṇasmaraṇadvārā sādaraṃ stutvā tattadvṛddhikarāṇyapi padāni uccaret /
adhyeṣaṇādibhirdvividhaṃ bodhicittaṃ samutpādya teṣāṃ svasvabhāvaṃ bhedaṃ vaiśiṣṭyañcāpi khyāpayet /  tataḥ bodhicaryā (ṇāṃ_)
prathamaṃ prāmāṇika ācāryaḥ śiṣye prasāda-sampratyayābhilāṣātmikāṃ śraddhāṃ janayet /
sā ca apramādena samprajanyena smṛtyā ca grahaṇīyeti śikṣeta /  tadanuṣṭhānāyāpi tīvravīryamutpādya nidhyānaduḥkhādhivāsanākṣāntim avikṣipta-samādhiṃ
prajñāniḥsvabhāvatāṃ ca jñātvā triśikṣāṃ trividhaprajñāṃ vā samādhāya caryāpathavidhinā  śikṣeta iti nirdiśet /
ayaṃ tu lākṣaṇikamahāyānacittotpāda-śikṣā-deśanā-vidhiḥ kramo vā audārikatayā darśitaḥ /
